name: Catania
fun_fact: Fun fact: Catania has been destroyed by Mount Etna eruptions at least 7 times throughout history, yet locals keep rebuilding at the volcano's base - the lava-black stone used to reconstruct the Baroque city is so distinctive that Catania is nicknamed 'La CittÃ  Nera' (The Black City)!

hero_dishes.name: Pasta alla Norma
hero_dishes.description: Pasta with fried eggplant, tomato sauce, ricotta salata, and basil - Catania's signature dish
hero_dishes.origin_story: Named after the opera 'Norma' by Catania-born composer Vincenzo Bellini. Legend says a guest declared it 'una vera Norma!' (a true masterpiece)
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Trattoria del Cavaliere, Osteria Antica Marina, every restaurant in Catania

hero_dishes.name: Arancini
hero_dishes.description: Fried rice balls stuffed with ragÃ¹, peas, and mozzarella (cone-shaped in Eastern Sicily)
hero_dishes.origin_story: In Catania, arancini are cone-shaped (not round like Palermo). The shape supposedly represents Mount Etna
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Savia (historic bar), Spinella, street vendors at La Pescheria market

hero_dishes.name: Granita con Brioche
hero_dishes.description: Semi-frozen flavored ice (almond, pistachio, coffee, lemon) served with a fluffy brioche for dipping
hero_dishes.origin_story: Sicilians eat this for BREAKFAST. The granita tradition likely comes from Arab snow collection on Etna
hero_dishes.where_to_find: CaffÃ¨ del Duomo, CaffÃ¨ Minerva, any bar for breakfast

hero_dishes.name: Seafood from La Pescheria
hero_dishes.description: Fresh fish, swordfish, sea urchin, and shellfish from Catania's legendary fish market
hero_dishes.origin_story: La Pescheria has operated since medieval times - vendors shout prices in Sicilian dialect. Restaurants cook your purchase
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Osteria Antica Marina (inside the market), market restaurants

signature_drinks.name: Etna Wine
signature_drinks.description: Volcanic wines from Mount Etna's slopes - reds from Nerello Mascalese grape
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: At enotecas throughout the city - Etna wines have DOC status and international acclaim

signature_drinks.name: Seltz Limone e Sale
signature_drinks.description: Sparkling water with fresh lemon juice and a pinch of salt - Catania summer essential
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: At kiosks (chioschi) throughout the city, especially in summer heat

food_culture_notes: Etna's volcanic soil produces exceptional pistachios, blood oranges, and wine
La Pescheria fish market is one of Europe's most vibrant
Breakfast is sweet - granita or pastries, never savory
Via Etnea is the main food street stretching from Duomo to Etna foothills
